name: LD 40: Candy Cane County
description:
Made in under 72 hours for Ludum Dare 40.

Did you ever dream of candy when you were a child? Did you also dream of getting a sugar rush from eating way too much candy and exploding because of an overdose? No? Well, this is your chance!

  
/// REMEMBER \\\
  
Candy will increase your sugar level! You will get a sugar rush from all that sugar, be careful not to overdose!
  
Broccoli is disgusting! It makes you vomit, but that does mean you lose some of your sugar level!
  
There might be some guns floating around, be sure to grab it if you see one.
  
  
/// CONTROLS \\\
  
Maneuver   -   W, A, S, D / Arrow Keys
  
Shoot      -   Left Mouse / Spacebar
  
restart    -   R
